task.summary: Default task
Added code to handle and set default level as required for new "top level" texts as well as subtexts
Added multi-select option and text to POS search
Added some temporary code to enable the renaming of files in a given directory - renameFiles.php - and a temporary directory for testing - tmp/
Reworked renameFiles to handle many directories
Removed renameFiles.php and deleted tmp dir
Added level ("importance") icons (stars) to subtext list in corpus browse
Date range block now no longer written in search from for subtexts
First pass at searching by district (location) Bug fix for jQuery error in browse corpus
Some placeholder code on search form for restricting by district. Fixed jQuery bug in corpus browse
Fixed bug whereby citation scope would reset to database value instead of default.

Fixed bugs with selection of citation context: 1. Clicking a token to select start/end point stopped +/- buttons from working 2. Taking the context down to "zero" for either pre/post would cause unexpected behaviour

Added code to xml2csv.php to handle districts (recursively if needed) Bug fix in slip citation: reset context working Slip lock functionality: 1. slips can only be locked/unlocked by superusers 2. slips are unlocked by default (database change) 3. lock icon displays in slips modal if slip is locked 4. locked slips can only be edited by superusers 5. unlock request emails should go to superusers (not "owners") TODO: disable email functionality for superusers and remove ownership code so that any user can edit any unlocked slip
Some changes to the lock slip functionality for superusers.
fixed bug where citation context was editable within entries added English tranlsation beneath each entry citation
Added a prototype PDF viewer for directories - much work needed
Fixed a minor issue with the constant definitions that was generating some warnings.
Added directories for input and output files in CorpasXMLParser
Working code for saving lexeme data TODO: forms, translations, notes; and correct window close behaviour
Initial refactoring for MVC
Working code for saving lexeme data including forms, translations, notes. TODO: correct window close behaviour; create addlexeme.php; add/delete parts
Added code to add/delete forms, translations, and notes
Recoded viewMhw.php to use new foreign key "lexeme_id"
Created addLexeme.php, addPart.php, deletePart.php. Some edits in viewMhw.php to handle foreign keys and make links work.
Added search restrictions for preceding and following context
Added option to order search results by reverse preceding word.
Basic form with some jQuery for multi-word (preceding and following) search inputs
First pass at code to enable searching by preceding and following word. TODO; break up Wordform code in corpus_search.php to allow it to work with new code. Add pagination code for results.
Some bug fixes
Some basic introductory pagination code for slow_search
New approach to chunked dictionary search results using pagination.min.js. Basic structure working returning dates.
Added loading image for dictionary view results Sorted out showing/hiding behaviour for dictionary view results Tidied up some bits and pieces in dictionary view results

Refactored wordform search into the main search function and added REGEXP support for all searches Tidied up loading of dictionary view results Bug fix in switching between corpus and dictionary views
Initial work on fleshing out the slow search to display database information in results. Some initial basic refactoring of slow search in line with MVC
Added AJAX support to slow search. Many fixes for slow search.
Additional AJAX work on slow search to handle slip links
Added index IDs to slip links in slow search to facilitate correct updating of slip links in results after slip creation
Added option on search form to choose between searching for all results and chunking results. Added option to choose chunk size. Fixed issues with full results not paginating.

Added option on search form to choose between searching for all results and chunking results. Added option to choose chunk size. Fixed issues with full results not paginating. Fixed issue where chunked results weren't working correctly due to conflict with "all results" functionality. TODO: fix "all results" functionality
Bug fix for all results and chunked results not playing nicely together. Many UI improvements
Reworked regular expression searching for headword (lemma) to ensure word boundary is respected
Ensured all word links in results open in new tab

Refactored slow search to work entirely asynchronously. Added check for end of results and added message for user Simplified XPath in search box and added necessary prefix and suffix in the model's search function
Added REGEX functionality to preceding and following word search options
Trimmed user facing XPath query in slow search box and added necessary back end code to model
Finally (!!) completed a working version of slow search by text, including iteratively searching subtexts. Added text ID restrict field to slow search form just for testing just now
Created models\sense class to work with new sense database model Reworked models\slip class to work with new senses Initial work on views\slip to accommodate new code
Completed refactor of views\slip to use new sense model
Completed refactor of slip links in results to use new sense model

Collections recoded to work with new sense model. Initial work on recoding entries to work with new sense model. Still requires a fair bit of refactoring, mostly in sorting unique senses and grouping. Renaming of senses in entry page not yet functional.

Basic form with some jQuery for multi-word (preceding and following) search inputs
First pass at code to enable searching by preceding and following word. TODO; break up Wordform code in corpus_search.php to allow it to work with new code. Add pagination code for results.
Some bug fixes

Added loading image for dictionary view results Sorted out showing/hiding behaviour for dictionary view results Tidied up some bits and pieces in dictionary view results

Added AJAX support to slow search. Many fixes for slow search.
Additional AJAX work on slow search to handle slip links
Added index IDs to slip links in slow search to facilitate correct updating of slip links in results after slip creation
Added option on search form to choose between searching for all results and chunking results. Added option to choose chunk size. Fixed issues with full results not paginating.

Added option on search form to choose between searching for all results and chunking results. Added option to choose chunk size. Fixed issues with full results not paginating. Fixed issue where chunked results weren't working correctly due to conflict with "all results" functionality. TODO: fix "all results" functionality
Bug fix for all results and chunked results not playing nicely together. Many UI improvements
Reworked regular expression searching for headword (lemma) to ensure word boundary is respected
Ensured all word links in results open in new tab

Refactored slow search to work entirely asynchronously. Added check for end of results and added message for user Simplified XPath in search box and added necessary prefix and suffix in the model's search function
Added REGEX functionality to preceding and following word search options
Trimmed user facing XPath query in slow search box and added necessary back end code to model
Finally (!!) completed a working version of slow search by text, including iteratively searching subtexts. Added text ID restrict field to slow search form just for testing just now

Completed refactor of views\slip to use new sense model
Completed refactor of slip links in results to use new sense model

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Collections recoded to work with new sense model. Initial work on recoding entries to work with new sense model. Still requires a fair bit of refactoring, mostly in sorting unique senses and grouping. Renaming of senses in entry page not yet functional.
